parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To follow after, imitate. From ek and akoloutheo; to follow out, i.e. to imitate, obey, yield to.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From a compound of a and a presumed selges; licentiousness.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Plural

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A way, road, journey, path. Apparently a primary word; a road; by implication, a progress; figuratively, a mode or means.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From blasphemos; to vilify; specially, to speak impiously.
